title.bibl: De Forenede Staters Danske Almanak, 1914, p. 73. [The Schools of the Danish Church]

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

div.bibl: De Forenede Staters Danske Almanak, 1914, p. 73. [THE SCHOOLS OF THE DANISH CHURCH]

body.p: Den Danske Kirke (The Danish Church) has in Chicago the following schools:
At St. Ansgar: Sunday school, 90 pupils with 6 teachers.
Vacation school for 25 days, with 23 pupils.
Saturday school for 36 days, with 35 pupils.
At St. Stefan: Sunday school, 80 pupils with 8 teachers.
Vacation school for 40 days, with 30 pupils.
Saturday school for 34 days, with 14 pupils.
At Trinitatis: Sunday school, 114 pupils with 13 teachers.
Vacation school for 52 days, with 40 pupils.
Saturday school for 20 days, with 24 pupils.
